script-could-not-validate: Could not validate source due to errors.
script-desc: Framework for embedding multiple scripting languages into MediaWiki pages
script-doc-page-header: '''This is the documentation page for the ''$1'' script [[$2]]'''.
script-doc-page-does-not-exist: ''Documentation for this $1 script can be created at [[$2]]''.
script-error-category-desc: There was an error when processing the scripts included on the page.
script-invalid-engine-specification-erro: The specification for the engine "$1" is invalid ($2).
script-missing-engine-error: No engine has been configured for script "$1".
script-missing-engine-header: ''The engine needed to execute this script is missing''.
script-missing-function-name-error: You did not specify a function to call. You must specify a function to call as the second argument.
script-no-engine-error: No valid engine has been configured for this file extension.
script-python-open-process-error: Failed to open process to "$1" using the "$2" executable: $3.
